name: UploadDisputeEvidenceText
description:
Upload text evidence for a dispute challenge.

Use this tool to upload textual evidence to support a dispute challenge. Call this tool when you need to provide written information or arguments for a dispute with a unique dispute ID.

parameters.name: dispute_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the dispute to upload text evidence for.

value_schema.description: The ID of the dispute for which you want to upload evidence.

parameters.name: unique_request_key
parameters.description: A unique key for identifying and ensuring the idempotency of the request. For additional details, see Square's idempotency documentation.

value_schema.description: A unique key identifying the request. For more information, see [Idempotency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/working-with-apis/idempotency).

parameters.name: evidence_text_string
parameters.description: Provide the textual evidence string to be used in the dispute challenge.

parameters.name: dispute_evidence_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of evidence for the dispute. Options include: GENERIC_EVIDENCE, ONLINE_OR_APP_ACCESS_LOG, AUTHORIZATION_DOCUMENTATION, etc.

value_schema.description: The type of the dispute evidence.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: dispute_id
parameters.description: The ID of the dispute for which you want to upload evidence.

value_schema.description: The ID of the dispute for which you want to upload evidence.

parameters.name: idempotency_key
parameters.description: A unique key identifying the request. For more information, see [Idempotency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/working-with-apis/idempotency).

value_schema.description: A unique key identifying the request. For more information, see [Idempotency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/working-with-apis/idempotency).

parameters.name: evidence_type
parameters.description: The type of the dispute evidence.

value_schema.description: The type of the dispute evidence.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
